transcript: when you're younger you feel like the biggest risk you take is like what job you're going to start at but you change jobs a lot when you're younger you also like have fears about like finding the perfect business that you're going to start 99.9% of entrepreneurs start multiple businesses in their career what happens is you actually learn from each business what you liked and it usually takes a few before you like make it big you know most of the time you just try and cover your losses
